scripts.pretest: python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip3 install tox -qq
scripts.dev: $npm_execpath run build-funcs && serverless deploy --stage dev --region us-west-2 --verbose
scripts.stage: $npm_execpath run build-funcs && serverless deploy --stage stage --region us-east-2 --verbose
scripts.prod: $npm_execpath run build-funcs && serverless deploy --stage prod --region us-east-1 --verbose
scripts.sandbox: $npm_execpath run build-funcs && serverless deploy --stage sandbox --region us-west-1 --verbose
